quiz.question: _________ mustache
quiz.explanation: 小胡子，八字胡。The old-fashioned barber wore a distinctive handlebar mustache. 老式理发师留着独特的八字胡。

quiz.question: ______ moustache
quiz.explanation: 小胡子，法式小胡子。The elegant gentleman cultivated a thin French moustache. 这位优雅的绅士留着细细的法式小胡子。

quiz.question: unsheathe _____
quiz.explanation: 拔出，拔出剑。The knight would unsheathe sword in preparation for battle. 骑士会拔出剑准备战斗。

quiz.question: swathe __ ____
quiz.explanation: 一长条，一长条土地。The fire destroyed a wide swathe of land in the forest. 大火摧毁了森林中一大片一长条土地。

quiz.question: seethe ____ _____
quiz.explanation: 愤怒，充满愤怒。He would seethe with anger but remain silent. 他会充满愤怒但保持沉默。

quiz.question: teething ____
quiz.explanation: 出牙，出牙的婴儿。The teething baby was fussy and kept crying all night. 出牙的婴儿烦躁不安，整夜哭泣。

quiz.question: writhe __ ____
quiz.explanation: 扭动，痛苦地扭动。The injured soldier would writhe in pain on the battlefield. 受伤的士兵会在战场上痛苦地扭动。

quiz.question: soothe ______
quiz.explanation: 安抚，安抚神经。A cup of warm tea can soothe nerves after a stressful day. 一杯温茶可以在压力大的一天后安抚神经。

quiz.question: ____ specie
quiz.explanation: 硬币，金币。The merchant demanded payment in gold specie rather than paper money. 商人要求用金币而不是纸币付款。

quiz.question: ___ laddie
quiz.explanation: 小伙子，小小伙子。The Scottish grandfather called his grandson a wee laddie. 苏格兰祖父称他的孙子为小小伙子。

quiz.question: ___ budgie
quiz.explanation: 虎皮鹦鹉，宠物虎皮鹦鹉。She kept a colorful pet budgie in a cage by the window. 她在窗边的笼子里养了一只色彩鲜艳的宠物虎皮鹦鹉。

quiz.question: _____ bogie
quiz.explanation: 转向架，火车转向架。The mechanic inspected the train bogie for any damage. 机械师检查火车转向架是否有任何损坏。

quiz.question: hie ____
quiz.explanation: 赶快去，赶快离开。The messenger would hie away to deliver the urgent news. 信使会赶快离开去传递紧急消息。

quiz.question: underlie _____
quiz.explanation: 成为基础，成为基础的原因。Economic factors often underlie cause of social unrest. 经济因素通常是社会动荡成为基础的原因。

quiz.question: _____ kelpie
quiz.explanation: 水妖，水妖。Scottish folklore tells tales of the dangerous water kelpie. 苏格兰民间传说讲述了危险的水妖的故事。

quiz.question: eerie _______
quiz.explanation: 怪异的，怪异的寂静。An eerie silence filled the abandoned house. 怪异的寂静充满了废弃的房子。

quiz.question: _____ reverie
quiz.explanation: 遐想，甜蜜的遐想。She was lost in sweet reverie about her childhood summers. 她沉浸在对童年夏天的甜蜜的遐想中。

quiz.question: ___________ pixie
quiz.explanation: 小精灵，淘气的小精灵。The mischievous pixie played tricks on the forest travelers. 淘气的小精灵对森林旅行者恶作剧。

quiz.question: ____ flake
quiz.explanation: 薄片，雪花。Each delicate snow flake had a unique pattern. 每片精致的雪花都有独特的图案。

quiz.question: forsake _______
quiz.explanation: 抛弃，抛弃朋友。He promised never to forsake friends in times of need. 他承诺永远不会在需要的时候抛弃朋友。

quiz.question: overtake ___
quiz.explanation: 超越，超越汽车。It's dangerous to overtake car on a narrow mountain road. 在狭窄的山路上超越汽车是危险的。

quiz.question: businesslike ______
quiz.explanation: 公事公办的，公事公办的态度。The lawyer maintained a businesslike manner throughout the meeting. 律师在整个会议中保持公事公办的态度。

quiz.question: choke ____
quiz.explanation: 锁喉，锁喉抓握。The wrestler applied a choke hold to his opponent. 摔跤手对对手使用了锁喉抓握。

quiz.question: artichoke _____
quiz.explanation: 朝鲜蓟，朝鲜蓟心。The chef prepared a salad with artichoke heart as the main ingredient. 厨师准备了一份以朝鲜蓟心为主要成分的沙拉。

quiz.question: _______ bloke
quiz.explanation: 家伙，英国家伙。The friendly British bloke helped us find our way. 友好的英国家伙帮助我们找到了路。

quiz.question: poke ___
quiz.explanation: 戳，取笑。The comedians would poke fun at politicians in their sketches. 喜剧演员会在他们的小品中取笑政治家。

quiz.question: _____ fluke
quiz.explanation: 侥幸，幸运的侥幸。His victory was just a lucky fluke, not real skill. 他的胜利只是幸运的侥幸，不是真正的技能。

quiz.question: ____ puke
quiz.explanation: 呕吐，感到想呕吐。The bumpy car ride made her feel puke. 颠簸的车程让她感到想呕吐。

quiz.question: ______ tyke
quiz.explanation: 小孩，小小孩。The little tyke was full of energy and mischief. 小小孩充满活力和淘气。

quiz.question: ___ bale
quiz.explanation: 捆，干草捆。The farmer stacked the hay bale in the barn. 农夫把干草捆堆在谷仓里。

quiz.question: exhale ______
quiz.explanation: 呼气，深深地呼气。The yoga instructor told students to exhale deeply and relax. 瑜伽教练告诉学生深深地呼气并放松。

quiz.question: impale ______
quiz.explanation: 刺穿，刺穿受害者。The medieval torture device would impale victim on sharp spikes. 中世纪的酷刑装置会用尖刺刺穿受害者。

quiz.question: telltale ____
quiz.explanation: 泄密的，泄密的迹象。The muddy footprints were a telltale sign of the intruder. 泥泞的脚印是入侵者的泄密的迹象。

quiz.question: stale _____
quiz.explanation: 不新鲜的，不新鲜的面包。The stale bread was too hard to eat. 不新鲜的面包太硬了，无法食用。

quiz.question: despicable ___
quiz.explanation: 卑鄙的，卑鄙的行为。The villain's despicable act shocked everyone. 恶棍的卑鄙的行为让每个人都震惊了。

quiz.question: formidable _________
quiz.explanation: 强大的，强大的挑战。Climbing Mount Everest is a formidable challenge. 攀登珠穆朗玛峰是一个强大的挑战。

quiz.question: unmanageable _________
quiz.explanation: 难以控制的，难以控制的情况。The crisis became an unmanageable situation. 危机变成了难以控制的情况。

quiz.question: breakable _____
quiz.explanation: 易碎的，易碎的玻璃。Handle the breakable glass items with care. 小心处理易碎的玻璃物品。

quiz.question: unremarkable ___
quiz.explanation: 平凡的，平凡的人。He appeared to be an unremarkable man in every way. 他在各方面看起来都是个平凡的人。

quiz.question: unassailable ________
quiz.explanation: 攻不破的，攻不破的堡垒。The castle was built as an unassailable fortress on the cliff. 城堡建在悬崖上作为攻不破的堡垒。

quiz.question: ______ syllable
quiz.explanation: 音节，单音节。The word 'cat' has a single syllable. 单词'cat'有一个单音节。

quiz.question: impregnable ____
quiz.explanation: 坚不可摧的，坚不可摧的墙。The fortress had an impregnable wall that repelled all attacks. 堡垒有坚不可摧的墙，抵御了所有攻击。

quiz.question: undoable ____
quiz.explanation: 无法完成的，无法完成的任务。The deadline made it seem like an undoable task. 截止日期让它看起来像是无法完成的任务。

quiz.question: inescapable ____
quiz.explanation: 不可避免的，不可避免的命运。Death is an inescapable fate for all living beings. 死亡是所有生物不可避免的命运。

quiz.question: palpable _______
quiz.explanation: 明显的，明显的紧张。There was palpable tension in the room during the negotiation. 谈判期间房间里有明显的紧张。

quiz.question: innumerable _____
quiz.explanation: 无数的，无数的星星。The night sky was filled with innumerable stars. 夜空中布满了无数的星星。

quiz.question: admirable _______
quiz.explanation: 令人钦佩的，令人钦佩的品质。Her perseverance was an admirable quality. 她的毅力是令人钦佩的品质。

quiz.question: _______ recognisable
quiz.explanation: 可识别的，法律上可识别的。The document must be legally recognisable to be valid. 该文件必须在法律上可识别才能有效。

quiz.question: advisable ______
quiz.explanation: 明智的，明智的行动。Consulting a lawyer is an advisable action before signing. 在签字前咨询律师是明智的行动。

quiz.question: respectable ______
quiz.explanation: 受人尊敬的，受人尊敬的家庭。They came from a respectable family in the community. 他们来自社区里一个受人尊敬的家庭。

quiz.question: excitable _____
quiz.explanation: 容易激动的，容易激动的孩子。The excitable child jumped up and down with joy. 容易激动的孩子高兴得跳上跳下。

quiz.question: creditable ______
quiz.explanation: 值得称赞的，值得称赞的努力。The team made a creditable effort despite losing. 尽管输了，球队还是做出了值得称赞的努力。

quiz.question: veritable _____
quiz.explanation: 真正的，真正的盛宴。The banquet was a veritable feast with dozens of dishes. 宴会是一场真正的盛宴，有几十道菜。

quiz.question: irritable ____
quiz.explanation: 易怒的，易怒的心情。Lack of sleep put him in an irritable mood. 睡眠不足让他处于易怒的心情。

quiz.question: lamentable _____
quiz.explanation: 令人遗憾的，令人遗憾的状态。The building was in a lamentable state of disrepair. 这座建筑处于令人遗憾的状态，年久失修。

quiz.question: inscrutable ____
quiz.explanation: 难以理解的，难以理解的面孔。The poker player maintained an inscrutable face. 扑克玩家保持着难以理解的面孔。

quiz.question: lovable _________
quiz.explanation: 可爱的，可爱的角色。The puppy was a lovable character that everyone adored. 这只小狗是一个可爱的角色，每个人都喜欢。

quiz.question: sizable _______
quiz.explanation: 相当大的，相当大的财富。He inherited a sizable fortune from his grandfather. 他从祖父那里继承了相当大的财富。

quiz.question: babble ____________
quiz.explanation: 胡言乱语，语无伦次地胡言乱语。The confused patient would babble incoherently. 困惑的病人会语无伦次地胡言乱语。

quiz.question: dabble __ ________
quiz.explanation: 涉猎，涉猎政治。He would dabble in politics but never seriously committed. 他会涉猎政治，但从不认真投入。

quiz.question: gabble ________
quiz.explanation: 急促不清地说，急促不清地说废话。The nervous speaker would gabble nonsense when pressured. 紧张的演讲者在压力下会急促不清地说废话。

quiz.question: ______ squabble
quiz.explanation: 争吵，家庭争吵。The family squabble ruined Thanksgiving dinner. 家庭争吵毁了感恩节晚餐。

quiz.question: _____ pebble
quiz.explanation: 鹅卵石，小鹅卵石。She picked up a small pebble from the beach. 她从海滩上捡起一块小鹅卵石。

quiz.question: nibble ______
quiz.explanation: 小口咬，小口咬奶酪。The mouse would nibble cheese throughout the night. 老鼠整夜都会小口咬奶酪。

quiz.question: scribble _____
quiz.explanation: 潦草地写，潦草地写笔记。The journalist would scribble notes during the interview. 记者会在采访时潦草地写笔记。

quiz.question: dribble ____
quiz.explanation: 运球，运球。The basketball player could dribble ball with either hand. 篮球运动员可以用任何一只手运球。

quiz.question: quibble ____
quiz.explanation: 争辩，争辩。Don't quibble over minor details. 不要争辩小细节。

quiz.question: ____ bobble
quiz.explanation: 发圈，头发发圈。She tied her ponytail with a colorful hair bobble. 她用彩色的头发发圈扎了马尾辫。

quiz.question: cobble ______
quiz.explanation: 鹅卵石，鹅卵石街道。The old European town had a charming cobble street. 这个古老的欧洲小镇有迷人的鹅卵石街道。

quiz.question: hobble _____
quiz.explanation: 蹒跚，蹒跚前行。The injured hiker would hobble along with a makeshift crutch. 受伤的徒步旅行者会用临时拐杖蹒跚前行。

quiz.question: wobble _____
quiz.explanation: 摇晃，摇晃的椅子。The uneven legs made the wobble chair unstable. 不平的腿让摇晃的椅子不稳定。

quiz.question: _____ stubble
quiz.explanation: 胡茬，剃胡茬。He needed to shave stubble before the important meeting. 他需要在重要会议前剃胡茬。

quiz.question: ____ feeble
quiz.explanation: 虚弱的，感到虚弱。After the illness, he would feel feeble for weeks. 生病后，他会感到虚弱好几个星期。

quiz.question: treble ____
quiz.explanation: 高音，高音谱号。The soprano part is written in treble clef. 女高音部分用高音谱号书写。

quiz.question: invincible ____
quiz.explanation: 无敌的，无敌的军队。The Romans believed they had an invincible army. 罗马人相信他们有无敌的军队。

quiz.question: irascible ___ ___
quiz.explanation: 易怒的，易怒的老人。The irascible old man yelled at children on his lawn. 易怒的老人对他草坪上的孩子们大喊大叫。

quiz.question: legible ___________
quiz.explanation: 清晰的，清晰的笔迹。The doctor had surprisingly legible handwriting. 这位医生有着令人惊讶的清晰的笔迹。

quiz.question: ______ discernible
quiz.explanation: 可辨别的，勉强可辨别。The distant mountain was barely discernible in the fog. 远处的山在雾中勉强可辨别。

quiz.question: collapsible _____
quiz.explanation: 可折叠的，可折叠的椅子。The campers brought a collapsible chair for easy transport. 露营者带来了一把可折叠的椅子以便运输。

quiz.question: amble _____
quiz.explanation: 漫步，漫步前行。The couple would amble along the beach at sunset. 这对夫妇会在日落时沿着海滩漫步前行。

quiz.question: preamble _________
quiz.explanation: 序言，序言声明。The lawyer read the preamble statement before the contract. 律师在合同前宣读了序言声明。

quiz.question: ramble __
quiz.explanation: 漫谈，漫谈下去。The professor would ramble on about ancient history. 教授会漫谈下去古代历史。

quiz.question: __________ bramble
quiz.explanation: 荆棘，黑莓荆棘。They picked berries from the thorny blackberry bramble. 他们从多刺的黑莓荆棘上摘浆果。

quiz.question: scramble ____
quiz.explanation: 炒，炒鸡蛋。She would scramble eggs for breakfast every morning. 她每天早上都会炒鸡蛋作为早餐。

quiz.question: _____ tremble
quiz.explanation: 颤抖，手颤抖。His hands tremble with nervousness before the speech. 演讲前他的手因紧张而颤抖。

quiz.question: fumble ____
quiz.explanation: 摸索，摸索钥匙。She would fumble keys in the dark trying to unlock the door. 她会在黑暗中摸索钥匙试图开门。

quiz.question: jumble ____
quiz.explanation: 混杂，旧货义卖。The charity held a jumble sale to raise funds. 慈善机构举办了旧货义卖来筹集资金。

quiz.question: mumble _______
quiz.explanation: 含糊不清地说，含糊不清地小声说。The shy student would mumble quietly when called upon. 害羞的学生被叫到时会含糊不清地小声说。

quiz.question: crumble ____
quiz.explanation: 弄碎，弄碎蛋糕。The dry crumble cake easily into pieces. 干燥的蛋糕容易弄碎成碎片。

quiz.question: grumble __________
quiz.explanation: 抱怨，不断地抱怨。The complainer would grumble constantly about everything. 抱怨者会不断地抱怨一切。

quiz.question: stumble ____
quiz.explanation: 绊倒，绊倒。Be careful not to stumble over the uneven pavement. 小心不要绊倒在不平的人行道上。

quiz.question: garble _______
quiz.explanation: 混淆，混淆信息。Poor reception would garble message on the phone. 接收不良会混淆电话中的信息。

quiz.question: _________ bauble
quiz.explanation: 小饰品，圣诞小饰品。They hung colorful Christmas bauble on the tree. 他们在树上挂了五颜六色的圣诞小饰品。

quiz.question: redouble _______
quiz.explanation: 加倍，加倍努力。The team decided to redouble efforts after the setback. 球队决定在挫折后加倍努力。

quiz.question: _____ treacle
quiz.explanation: 糖浆，甜糖浆。The dessert was made with sweet treacle. 甜点是用甜糖浆做的。

quiz.question: ____ manacle
quiz.explanation: 镣铐，铁镣铐。The prisoner wore heavy iron manacle on his wrists. 囚犯手腕上戴着沉重的铁镣铐。

quiz.question: _____ spectacle
quiz.explanation: 壮观景象，宏伟的壮观景象。The fireworks display was a grand spectacle. 烟花表演是宏伟的壮观景象。

quiz.question: _______ tentacle
quiz.explanation: 触手，章鱼触手。The octopus tentacle grabbed the fish swiftly. 章鱼触手迅速抓住了鱼。

quiz.question: monocle _____
quiz.explanation: 单片眼镜，单片眼镜玻璃。The Victorian gentleman wore a monocle glass. 维多利亚时代的绅士戴着单片眼镜玻璃。

quiz.question: encircle _____
quiz.explanation: 包围，包围敌人。The army planned to encircle enemy forces. 军队计划包围敌人部队。
